snippet: A suit, shoes and shirts for job interviews became possible for a young man with help from The Neediest Cases Fund.
abstract: Editorial highlights story of Tyrone Norfleet, whose life has been turned around thanks to help provided by Community Service Society, agency supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund; details ways in which readers can donate to fund.
lead_paragraph: A suit, shoes and shirts for job interviews became possible for a young man with help from The Neediest Cases Fund.

headline.seo: The Times Neediest Cases Fund Helps a Bronx Man

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations
